subject: science
title: Electricity and Electronics - Grade 10
content:
# Electricity and Electronics - Grade 10

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Understand the fundamental concepts of Ohm's Law, Series and Parallel Circuits, Semiconductors
- Apply scientific principles to real-world situations
- Analyze and interpret scientific data related to Electricity and Electronics

## Introduction
This lesson explores Electricity and Electronics, focusing on Ohm's Law, Series and Parallel Circuits, Semiconductors. Students will learn through hands-on activities,
demonstrations, and practical applications relevant to Sri Lankan context.

## Main Content
This section covers Ohm's Law, Series and Parallel Circuits, Semiconductors. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Key Concepts
Ohm's Law, Series and Parallel Circuits, Semiconductors

## Activities
1. Laboratory experiment demonstrating O
2. Group discussion on applications in Sri Lanka
3. Problem-solving exercises
4. Real-world case studies

## Assessment
Students will be assessed through practical work, written tests, and project presentations.

## Resources
- Textbook: Science for Grade 10 (Sri Lankan Curriculum)
- Laboratory equipment
- Digital resources and simulations
learning_outcomes: Apply knowledge of Series and Parallel Circuits
Analyze concepts related to Electricity and Electronics
